name: Hidden Objects Valentine's Day
description:
Hidden Objects – Valentine’s Day is a lovely designed Seek & Find game with 30+ Romantic Heart themed levels. 100’s of Objects to Find!

Explore romantic Valentine Gardens Around the World! Search through Heart Shaped Flower Arches in England, Locks of Love in Paris, Heart Sculptures in USA, Love Statues, Rose Gardens, Cupid’s Garden and more! Love is Love Regardless of Where You Live!

Find Valentine’s themed objects like Roses, Hearts, Cupid, Chocolate, Jewelry and more! WILL YOU BE MY VALENTINE?

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Seek & Find, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure is sure to entertain!

Hidden Objects – Valentine’s Day features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics of Romantic Valentine’s themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Will You Be My Valentine?


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
